casebody.data:
John C. CHAMBERS, Receiver, Americana Crop Hail Pool, Inc., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. MARYLAND CASUALTY COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 30093. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 9, 1971. R. A. Wilson, Underwood, Wilson, Sutton, Heare & Berry, Amarillo, Tex., for plaintiff-appellant. Wayne P. Sturdivant, Gibson, Ochsner, Adkins, Harlan & Hankins, Amarillo, Tex., for defendant-appellee.

Before GOLDBERG and DYER, Circuit Judges, and GROOMS, District Judge.

PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.2

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
